title: B_TRIG Function Block
description:
B_TRIG generates after a change of edge on the CLK
input an output pulse for exactly one PLC cycle. In contrast to the two
standard modules R_TRIG and F_TRIG that produce only at falling or rising
edge of a pulse, B_TRIG generates at falling and rising edge of an output
pulse.
name: B_TRIG

input.name: CLK
input.description: Input variable that represents the clock signal.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output variable that reflects the state triggered by the input clock signal.
